name: The Dark Knight Rises
desc: Eight years on, a new terrorist leader, Bane, overwhelms Gotham's finest, and the Dark Knight resurfaces to protect a city that has branded him an enemy.

name: The Intouchables
desc: After he becomes a quadriplegic from a paragliding accident, an aristocrat hires a young man from the projects to be his caretaker.

name: Django Unchained
desc: With the help of a German bounty hunter, a freed slave sets out to rescue his wife from a brutal Mississippi plantation owner.

name: The Avengers
desc: Nick Fury of S.H.I.E.L.D. brings together a team of super humans to form The Avengers to help save the Earth from Loki and his army.

name: The Hunt
desc: A teacher lives a lonely life, all the while struggling over his son's custody. His life slowly gets better as he finds love and receives good news from his son, but his new luck is about to be brutally shattered by an innocent little lie.

name: The Perks of Being a Wallflower
desc: An introvert freshman is taken under the wings of two seniors who welcome him to the real world.

name: Life of Pi
desc: A young man who survives a disaster at sea is hurtled into an epic journey of adventure and discovery. While cast away, he forms an unexpected connection with another survivor: a fearsome Bengal tiger.

name: The Hobbit: An Unexpected Journey
desc: A younger and more reluctant Hobbit, Bilbo Baggins, sets out on an "unexpected journey" to the Lonely Mountain with a spirited group of Dwarves to reclaim their stolen mountain home from a dragon named Smaug.

name: Before Midnight
desc: We meet Jesse and Celine nine years on in Greece. Almost two decades have passed since their first meeting on that train bound for Vienna.

name: The Act of Killing
desc: A documentary that challenges former Indonesian death squad leaders to reenact their real-life mass-killings in whichever cinematic genres they wish, including classic Hollywood crime scenarios and lavish musical numbers.

name: Searching for Sugar Man
desc: Two South Africans set out to discover what happened to their unlikely musical hero, the mysterious 1970s rock 'n' roller, Rodriguez.

name: Finding Nemo
desc: After his son is captured in the Great Barrier Reef and taken to Sydney, a timid clownfish sets out on a journey to bring him home.

name: Prisoners
desc: When Keller Dover's daughter and her friend go missing, he takes matters into his own hands as the police pursue multiple leads and the pressure mounts. But just how far will this desperate father go to protect his family?

name: Moonrise Kingdom
desc: A pair of young lovers flee their New England town, which causes a local search party to fan out and find them.

name: Argo
desc: A dramatization of the 1980 joint CIA-Canadian secret operation to extract six fugitive American diplomatic personnel out of revolutionary Iran.

name: Monsters, Inc.
desc: Monsters generate their city's power by scaring children, but they are terribly afraid themselves of being contaminated by children, so when one enters Monstropolis, top scarer Sulley finds his world disrupted.

name: Star Trek Into Darkness
desc: After the crew of the Enterprise find an unstoppable force of terror from within their own organization, Captain Kirk leads a manhunt to a war-zone world to capture a one man weapon of mass destruction.

name: Blackfish
desc: Notorious killer whale Tilikum is responsible for the deaths of three individuals, including a top killer whale trainer...

name: Wreck-It Ralph
desc: A video game villain wants to be a hero and sets out to fulfill his dream, but his quest brings havoc to the whole arcade where he lives.

name: Silver Linings Playbook
desc: After a stint in a mental institution, former teacher Pat Solitano moves back in with his parents and tries to reconcile with his ex-wife. Things get more challenging when Pat meets Tiffany, a mysterious girl with problems of her own.

name: Skyfall
desc: Bond's loyalty to M is tested when her past comes back to haunt her. Whilst MI6 comes under attack, 007 must track down and destroy the threat, no matter how personal the cost.

name: Les Misérables
desc: In 19th-century France, Jean Valjean, who for decades has been hunted by the ruthless policeman Javert after he breaks parole, agrees to care for factory worker Fantine's daughter, Cosette. The fateful decision changes their lives forever.

name: Stories We Tell
desc: A film that excavates layers of myth and memory to find the elusive truth at the core of a family of storytellers.

name: Detachment
desc: A substitute teacher who drifts from classroom to classroom finds a connection to the students and teachers during his latest assignment.

name: Looper
desc: In 2074, when the mob wants to get rid of someone, the target is sent 30 years into the past, where a hired gun awaits. Someone like Joe, who one day learns the mob wants to 'close the loop' by transporting back Joe's future self.

name: End of Watch
desc: Shot documentary-style, this film follows the daily grind of two young police officers in LA who are partners and friends, and what happens when they meet criminal forces greater than themselves.

name: Side by Side
desc: The documentary investigates the history, process and workflow of both digital and photochemical film creation.

name: This Is Not a Film
desc: It's been months since Jafar Panahi, stuck in jail, has been awaiting a verdict by the appeals court. By depicting a day in his life, Panahi and Mojtaba Mirtahmasb try to portray the deprivations looming in contemporary Iranian cinema.

name: The Central Park Five
desc: A documentary that examines the 1989 case of five black and Latino teenagers who were convicted of raping a white woman in Central Park. After having spent between 6 and 13 years each in prison, a serial rapist confessed to the crime.

name: Cloud Atlas
desc: An exploration of how the actions of individual lives impact one another in the past, present and future, as one soul is shaped from a killer into a hero, and an act of kindness ripples across centuries to inspire a revolution.

name: The House I Live In
desc: From the dealer to the narcotics officer, the inmate to the federal judge, a penetrating look inside America's criminal justice system, revealing the profound human rights implications of U.S. drug policy.

name: Mud
desc: Two young boys encounter a fugitive and form a pact to help him evade the bounty hunters on his trail and to reunite him with his true love.

name: West of Memphis
desc: An examination of a failure of justice in the case against the West Memphis Three.

name: Beasts of the Southern Wild
desc: Faced with both her hot-tempered father's fading health and melting ice-caps that flood her ramshackle bayou community and unleash ancient aurochs, six-year-old Hushpuppy must learn the ways of courage and love.

name: The Imposter
desc: A documentary centered on a young Frenchman who convinces a grieving Texas family that he is their 16-year-old son who has been missing for 3 years.

name: Zero Dark Thirty
desc: A chronicle of the decade-long hunt for al-Qaeda terrorist leader Osama bin Laden after the September 2001 attacks, and his death at the hands of the Navy S.E.A.L. Team 6 in May 2011.

name: Lincoln
desc: As the Civil War continues to rage, America's president struggles with continuing carnage on the battlefield and as he fights with many inside his own cabinet on the decision to emancipate the slaves.

name: The Impossible
desc: The story of a tourist family in Thailand caught in the destruction and chaotic aftermath of the 2004 Indian Ocean tsunami.

name: 56 Up
desc: Director Michael Apted revisits the same group of British-born adults after a 7 year wait. The subjects are interviewed as to the changes that have occurred in their lives during the last seven years.

name: The Conjuring
desc: Paranormal investigators Ed and Lorraine Warren work to help a family terrorized by a dark presence in their farmhouse.

name: Pina
desc: A tribute to the late German choreographer, Pina Bausch, as her dancers perform her most famous creations.

name: Rust and Bone
desc: Put in charge of his young son, Alain leaves Belgium for Antibes to live with his sister and her husband as a family. Alain's bond with Stephanie, a killer whale trainer, grows deeper after Stephanie suffers a horrible accident.

name: A Royal Affair
desc: A young queen, who is married to an insane king, falls secretly in love with her physician - and together they start a revolution that changes a nation forever.

name: No
desc: An ad executive comes up with a campaign to defeat Augusto Pinochet in Chile's 1988 referendum.
The life story of Jackie Robinson and his history-making signing with the Brooklyn Dodgers under the guidance of team executive Branch Rickey.

name: The Place Beyond the Pines
desc: A motorcycle stunt rider turns to robbing banks as a way to provide for his lover and their newborn child, a decision that puts him on a collision course with an ambitious rookie cop navigating a department ruled by a corrupt detective.

name: The Way Way Back
desc: Shy 14-year-old Duncan goes on summer vacation with his mother, her overbearing boyfriend, and her boyfriend's daughter. Having a rough time fitting in, Duncan finds an unexpected friend in Owen, manager of the Water Wizz water park.

name: Despicable Me 2
desc: Gru is recruited by the Anti-Villain League to help deal with a powerful new super criminal.

name: Frances Ha
desc: A story that follows a New York woman (who doesn't really have an apartment), apprentices for a dance company (though she's not really a dancer), and throws herself headlong into her dreams, even as their possible reality dwindles.

name: Lawless
desc: Set in Depression-era Franklin County, Virginia, a bootlegging gang is threatened by a new deputy and other authorities who want a cut of their profits.

name: Seven Psychopaths
desc: A struggling screenwriter inadvertently becomes entangled in the Los Angeles criminal underworld after his oddball friends kidnap a gangster's beloved Shih Tzu.

name: Flight
desc: An airline pilot saves a flight from crashing, but an investigation into the malfunctions reveals something troubling.

name: The Master
desc: A Naval veteran arrives home from war unsettled and uncertain of his future - until he is tantalized by The Cause and its charismatic leader.

name: What Maisie Knew
desc: In New York City, a young girl is caught in the middle of her parents' bitter custody battle.

name: The Great Gatsby
desc: A Midwestern war veteran finds himself drawn to the past and lifestyle of his millionaire neighbor.

name: Iron Man 3
desc: When Tony Stark's world is torn apart by a formidable terrorist called the Mandarin, he starts an odyssey of rebuilding and retribution.

name: Much Ado About Nothing
desc: A modern retelling of Shakespeare's classic comedy about two pairs of lovers with different takes on romance and a way with words.

name: Man of Steel
desc: A young itinerant worker is forced to confront his secret extraterrestrial heritage when Earth is invaded by members of his race.

name: The Amazing Spider-Man
desc: Peter Parker finds a clue that might help him understand why his parents disappeared when he was young. His path puts him on a collision course with Dr. Curt Connors, his father's former partner.

name: Ruby Sparks
desc: A novelist struggling with writer's block finds romance in a most unusual way: by creating a female character he thinks will love him, then willing her into existence.

name: Polisse
desc: A journalist covering police assigned to a juvenile division enters an affair with one of her subjects.

name: Prometheus
desc: A team of explorers discover a clue to the origins of mankind on Earth, leading them on a journey to the darkest corners of the universe. There, they must fight a terrifying battle to save the future of the human race.

name: The Cabin in the Woods
desc: Five friends go for a break at a remote cabin in the woods, where they get more than they bargained for. Together, they must discover the truth behind the cabin in the woods.

name: The Best Exotic Marigold Hotel
desc: British retirees travel to India to take up residence in what they believe is a newly restored hotel. Less luxurious than its advertisements, the Marigold Hotel nevertheless slowly begins to charm in unexpected ways.

name: Brave
desc: Determined to make her own path in life, Princess Merida defies a custom that brings chaos to her kingdom. Granted one wish, Merida must rely on her bravery and her archery skills to undo a beastly curse.

name: Ted
desc: As the result of a childhood wish, John Bennett's teddy bear, Ted, came to life and has been by John's side ever since - a friendship that's tested when Lori, John's girlfriend of four years, wants more from their relationship.

name: Pitch Perfect
desc: Beca, a freshman at Barden University, is cajoled into joining The Bellas, her school's all-girls singing group. Injecting some much needed energy into their repertoire, The Bellas take on their male rivals in a campus competition.

name: The Sessions
desc: A man in an iron lung who wishes to lose his virginity contacts a professional sex surrogate with the help of his therapist and priest.

name: The Kid with a Bike
desc: Abandoned by his father, a young boy is left in a state-run youth farm. In a random act of kindness, the town hairdresser agrees to foster him on weekends.

name: Rise of the Guardians
desc: When the evil spirit Pitch launches an assault on Earth, the Immortal Guardians team up to protect the innocence of children all around the world.

name: Hitler's Children
desc: A look into the lives of the descendants of the top Nazi officials who worked under Hitler's command.

name: Brooklyn Castle
desc: Amidst financial crises and unprecedented public school budget cuts, Brooklyn Castle takes an intimate look at the challenges and triumphs facing members of a junior high school's champion chess team.

name: Boy
desc: Set on the east coast of New Zealand in the year 1984, Boy, an 11-year-old kid and devout Michael Jackson fan gets a chance to know his father, who has returned to find a bag of money he buried years ago.

name: Now You See Me
desc: An FBI agent and an Interpol detective track a team of illusionists who pull off bank heists during their performances and reward their audiences with the money.

name: The Croods
desc: After their cave is destroyed, a caveman family must trek through an unfamiliar fantastical world with the help of an inventive boy.

name: Pacific Rim
desc: As a war between humankind and monstrous sea creatures wages on, a former pilot and a trainee are paired up to drive a seemingly obsolete special weapon in a desperate effort to save the world from the apocalypse.

name: Safety Not Guaranteed
desc: Three magazine employees head out on an assignment to interview a guy who placed a classified ad seeking a companion for time travel.

name: ParaNorman
desc: A misunderstood boy takes on ghosts, zombies and grown-ups to save his town from a centuries-old curse.

name: Dredd
desc: In a violent, futuristic city where the police have the authority to act as judge, jury and executioner, a cop teams with a trainee to take down a gang that deals the reality-altering drug, SLO-MO.

name: Frankenweenie
desc: Young Victor conducts a science experiment to bring his beloved dog Sparky back to life, only to face unintended, sometimes monstrous, consequences.

name: Bully
desc: A documentary on peer-to-peer bullying in schools across America.

name: Robot & Frank
desc: Set in the near future, an ex-jewel thief receives a gift from his son: a robot butler programmed to look after him. But soon the two companions try their luck as a heist team.

name: Side Effects
desc: A young woman's world unravels when a drug prescribed by her psychiatrist has unexpected side effects.

name: The Gatekeepers
desc: A documentary featuring interviews with all surviving former heads of Shin Bet, the Israeli security agency whose activities and membership are closely held state secrets.

name: Kon-Tiki
desc: The story of legendary explorer Thor Heyerdal's epic 4,300 miles crossing of the Pacific on a balsa wood raft in 1947, in an effort prove it was possible for South Americans to settle in Polynesia in pre-Columbian times.

name: From Up on Poppy Hill
desc: A group of Yokohama teens look to save their school's clubhouse from the wrecking ball in preparations for the 1964 Tokyo Olympics.

name: The Kings of Summer
desc: Three teenage friends, in the ultimate act of independence, decide to spend their summer building a house in the woods and living off the land.

name: This Is the End
desc: While attending a party at James Franco's house, Seth Rogen, Jay Baruchel and many other celebrities are faced with the apocalypse.

name: A Hijacking
desc: The crew of a Danish cargo ship is hijacked by Somali pirates who proceed to engage in escalating negotiations with authorities in Copenhagen.

name: Fast & Furious 6
desc: Hobbs has Dom and Brian reassemble their crew in order to take down a mastermind who commands an organization of mercenary drivers across 12 countries. Payment? Full pardons for them all.

name: People Like Us
desc: While settling his recently deceased father's estate, a salesman discovers he has a sister whom he never knew about, leading both siblings to re-examine their perceptions about family and life choices.

name: Hotel Transylvania
desc: Dracula, who operates a high-end resort away from the human world, goes into overprotective mode when a boy discovers the resort and falls for the count's teen-aged daughter.

name: Holy Motors
desc: From dawn to dusk, a few hours in the shadowy life of Monsieur Oscar...

name: Lore
desc: As the Allies sweep across Germany, Lore leads her siblings on a journey that exposes them to the truth of their parents' beliefs. An encounter with a mysterious refugee forces Lore to rely on a person she has always been taught to hate.

name: Warm Bodies
desc: After R (a highly unusual zombie) saves Julie from an attack, the two form a relationship that sets in motion a sequence of events that might transform the entire lifeless world.

name: Stoker
desc: After India's father dies, her Uncle Charlie, who she never knew existed, comes to live with her and her unstable mother. She comes to suspect this mysterious, charming man has ulterior motives and becomes increasingly infatuated with him.

name: Oblivion
desc: A veteran assigned to extract Earth's remaining resources begins to question what he knows about his mission and himself.

name: A Band Called Death
desc: A documentary on the 1970s punk trio Death, and their new-found popularity decades after they disbanded.

name: We're the Millers
desc: A veteran pot dealer creates a fake family as part of his plan to move a huge shipment of weed into the U.S. from Mexico.

name: The World's End
desc: Five friends who reunite in an attempt to top their epic pub crawl from 20 years earlier unwittingly become humankind's only hope for survival.

name: Arthur Christmas
desc: On Christmas night at the North Pole, Santa's youngest son looks to use his father's high-tech operation for an urgent mission.

name: Madagascar 3: Europe's Most Wanted
desc: Alex, Marty, Gloria and Melman are still fighting to get home to their beloved Big Apple. Their journey takes them through Europe where they find the perfect cover: a traveling circus, which they reinvent - Madagascar style.

name: Men in Black 3
desc: Agent J travels in time to MIB's early years in the 1960s, to stop an alien from assassinating his friend Agent K and changing history.

name: The Expendables 2
desc: Mr. Church reunites the Expendables for what should be an easy paycheck, but when one of their men is murdered on the job, their quest for revenge puts them deep in enemy territory and up against an unexpected threat.

name: Hitchcock
desc: A love story between influential filmmaker Alfred Hitchcock and wife Alma Reville during the filming of "Psycho" in 1959.

name: Jack Reacher
desc: A homicide investigator digs deeper into a case involving a trained military sniper who shot five random victims.

name: Upstream Color
desc: A man and woman are drawn together, entangled in the life cycle of an ageless organism. Identity becomes an illusion as they struggle to assemble the loose fragments of wrecked lives.

name: Trance
desc: An art auctioneer who has become mixed up with a group of criminals partners with a hypnotherapist in order to recover a lost painting.

name: Stuck in Love
desc: An acclaimed writer, his ex-wife, and their teenaged children come to terms with the complexities of love in all its forms over the course of one tumultuous year.

name: The Attack
desc: An Arab surgeon living in Tel Aviv discovers a dark secret about his wife in the aftermath of a suicide bombing.

name: The Invisible War
desc: An investigative documentary about the epidemic of rape of soldiers within the US military.

name: Killer Joe
desc: When a debt puts a young man's life in danger, he turns to putting a hit out on his evil mother in order to collect the insurance.

name: Gangster Squad
desc: Los Angeles, 1949: A secret crew of police officers led by two determined sergeants work together in an effort to take down the ruthless mob king Mickey Cohen who runs the city.

name: The Iceman
desc: The true story of Richard Kuklinski, the notorious contract killer and family man. When finally arrested in 1986, neither his wife nor daughters have any clue about his real profession.

name: The Bourne Legacy
desc: An expansion of the universe from Robert Ludlum's novels, centered on a new hero whose stakes have been triggered by the events of the previous three films.

name: The Words
desc: A writer at the peak of his literary success discovers the steep price he must pay for stealing another man's work.

name: Sleepwalk with Me
desc: A burgeoning stand-up comedian struggles with the stress of a stalled career, a stale relationship, and the wild spurts of severe sleepwalking he is desperate to ignore.

name: Anna Karenina
desc: Set in late-19th-century Russia high-society, the aristocrat Anna Karenina enters into a life-changing affair with the affluent Count Vronsky.

name: In the Family
desc: When his partner Cody dies in a car accident, Joey learns that their son, Chip, has been willed to Cody's sister. In his now solitary home life, Joey searches for a solution. The law is not on his side, but friends are.

name: The Sapphires
desc: It's 1968, and four young, talented Australian Aboriginal girls learn about love, friendship and war when their all girl group The Sapphires entertain the US troops in Vietnam.

name: Unfinished Song
desc: Grumpy pensioner Arthur honors his recently deceased wife's passion for performing by joining the unconventional local choir to which she used to belong, a process that helps him build bridges with his estranged son, James.

name: Insidious: Chapter 2
desc: The haunted Lambert family seeks to uncover the mysterious childhood secret that has left them dangerously connected to the spirit world.

name: Elysium
desc: In the year 2154, the very wealthy live on a man-made space station while the rest of the population resides on a ruined Earth. A man takes on a mission that could bring equality to the polarized worlds.

name: Kick-Ass 2
desc: The costumed high-school hero Kick-Ass joins with a group of normal citizens who have been inspired to fight crime in costume. Meanwhile, the Red Mist plots an act of revenge that will affect everyone Kick-Ass knows.

name: The Wolverine
desc: When Wolverine is summoned to Japan by an old acquaintance, he is embroiled in a conflict that forces him to confront his own demons.

name: 2 Guns
desc: A DEA agent and a naval intelligence officer find themselves on the run after a botched attempt to infiltrate a drug cartel. While fleeing, they learn the secret of their shaky alliance: Neither knew that the other was an undercover agent.

name: Your Sister's Sister
desc: Iris invites her friend Jack to stay at her family's island getaway after the death of his brother. At their remote cabin, Jack's drunken encounter with Hannah, Iris' sister, kicks off a revealing stretch of days.

name: First Position
desc: A documentary that follows six young dancers from around the world as they prepare for the Youth America Grand Prix, one of the most prestigious ballet competitions in the world.

name: Seeking a Friend for the End of the World
desc: As an asteroid nears Earth, a man finds himself alone after his wife leaves in a panic. He decides to take a road trip to reunite with his high school sweetheart. Accompanying him is a neighbor who inadvertently puts a wrench in his plan.

name: Hysteria
desc: The truth of how Mortimer Granville devised the invention of the first vibrator in the name of medical science.

name: The Queen of Versailles
desc: A documentary that follows a billionaire couple as they begin construction on a mansion inspired by Versailles. During the next two years, their empire, fueled by the real estate bubble and cheap money, falters due to the economic crisis.

name: Trouble with the Curve
desc: An ailing baseball scout in his twilight years takes his daughter along for one last recruiting trip.

name: Arbitrage
desc: A troubled hedge fund magnate desperate to complete the sale of his trading empire makes an error that forces him to turn to an unlikely person for help.

name: Sinister
desc: A true-crime writer finds a cache of 8mm "snuff" films that suggest the murder he is currently researching is the work of a serial killer whose career dates back to the 1960s.

name: Chasing Mavericks
desc: When young Jay Moriarty discovers that the mythic Mavericks surf break, one of the biggest waves on Earth, exists just miles from his Santa Cruz home, he enlists the help of local legend Frosty Hesson to train him to survive it.

name: Smashed
desc: A married couple whose bond is built on a mutual love of alcohol gets their relationship put to the test when the wife decides to get sober.

name: Quartet
desc: At a home for retired musicians, the annual concert to celebrate Verdi's birthday is disrupted by the arrival of Jean, an eternal diva and the former wife of one of the residents.

name: Evil Dead
desc: Five friends head to a remote cabin, where the discovery of a Book of the Dead leads them to unwittingly summon up demons living in the nearby woods. The evil presence possesses them until only one is left to fight for survival.

name: The Heat
desc: An uptight FBI Special Agent is paired with a foul-mouthed Boston cop to take down a ruthless drug lord.

name: Red 2
desc: Retired C.I.A. agent Frank Moses reunites his unlikely team of elite operatives for a global quest to track down a missing portable nuclear device.

name: Something from Nothing: The Art of Rap
desc: A documentary on rap music and its rise to global prominence.

name: Savages
desc: Pot growers Ben and Chon face off against the Mexican drug cartel who kidnapped their shared girlfriend.

name: The Island President
desc: After bringing democracy to his country, President Mohamed Nasheed of the Maldives, the lowest-lying country in the world, takes up the fight to keep his homeland from disappearing under the sea.

name: Ice Age: Continental Drift
desc: Manny, Diego, and Sid embark upon another adventure after their continent is set adrift. Using an iceberg as a ship, they encounter sea creatures and battle pirates as they explore a new world.

name: Premium Rush
desc: In Manhattan, a bike messenger picks up an envelope that attracts the interest of a dirty cop, who pursues the cyclist throughout the city.

name: Compliance
desc: When a prank caller convinces a fast food restaurant manager to interrogate an innocent young employee, no-one is left unharmed. Based on true events.

name: Liberal Arts
desc: When 30-something Jesse returns to his alma mater for a professor's retirement party, he falls for Zibby, a college student, and is faced with a powerful attraction that springs up between them.

name: A Late Quartet
desc: Members of a world-renowned string quartet struggle to stay together in the face of death, competing egos and insuppressible lust.

name: Meet the Fokkens
desc: A documentary on Louise and Martine Fokkens, 69-year-old twin sisters who have worked as prostitutes in the red-light district in Amsterdam for over 40 years.

name: This Must Be the Place
desc: Cheyenne, a retired rock star living off his royalties in Dublin, returns to New York City to find the man responsible for a humiliation suffered by his recently deceased father during WWII.

name: Oz the Great and Powerful
desc: A small-time magician is swept away to an enchanted land and is forced into a power struggle between three witches.

name: Snitch
desc: A father goes undercover for the DEA in order to free his son who was imprisoned after being set up in drug deal.

name: The Call
desc: When a veteran 911 operator takes a life-altering call from a teenage girl who has just been abducted, she realizes that she must confront a killer from her past in order to save the girl's life.

name: Pain & Gain
desc: A trio of bodybuilders in Florida get caught up in an extortion ring and a kidnapping scheme that goes terribly wrong.

name: The Lone Ranger
desc: Native American warrior Tonto recounts the untold tales that transformed John Reid, a man of the law, into a legend of justice.

name: Ain't Them Bodies Saints
desc: The tale of an outlaw who escapes from prison and sets out across the Texas hills to reunite with his wife and the daughter he has never met.

name: Our Children
desc: Like millions of other couples, Mounir and Murielle fall in love. Like millions of other couples, Mounir and Murielle have children...

name: Take This Waltz
desc: A happily married woman falls for the artist who lives across the street.

name: Sound of My Voice
desc: A journalist and his girlfriend get pulled in while they investigate a cult whose leader claims to be from the future.

name: The Odd Life of Timothy Green
desc: A childless couple bury a box in their backyard, containing all of their wishes for an infant. Soon, a child is born, though Timothy Green is not all that he appears.

name: Hope Springs
desc: After thirty years of marriage, a middle-aged couple attends an intense, week-long counseling session to work on their relationship.

name: Celeste & Jesse Forever
desc: A divorcing couple tries to maintain their friendship while they both pursue other people.

name: John Dies at the End
desc: A new street drug that sends its users across time and dimensions has one drawback: some people return as no longer human. Can two college dropouts save humankind from this silent, otherworldly invasion?

name: The Last Stand
desc: The leader of a drug cartel busts out of a courthouse and speeds to the Mexican border, where the only thing in his path is a sheriff and his inexperienced staff.

name: Stand Up Guys
desc: A pair of aging stickup men try to get the old gang back together for one last hurrah before one of the guys takes his last assignment - to kill his comrade.

name: Dead Man Down
desc: In New York City, a crime lord's right-hand man is seduced by a woman seeking retribution.

name: Olympus Has Fallen
desc: Disgraced former Presidential guard Mike Banning finds himself trapped inside the White House in the wake of a terrorist attack; using his inside knowledge, Banning works with national security to rescue the President from his kidnappers.

name: The Reluctant Fundamentalist
desc: A young Pakistani man is chasing corporate success on Wall Street. He finds himself embroiled in a conflict between his American Dream, a hostage crisis, and the enduring call of his family's homeland.

name: Room 237
desc: An exploration of various interpretations of Stanley Kubrick's horror film, "The Shining".

name: Fill the Void
desc: A young Hasidic Jewish woman is pressured into an arranged levirate marriage to an older widower.

name: Europa Report
desc: An international crew of astronauts undertakes a privately funded mission to search for life on Jupiter's fourth largest moon.

name: The Raven
desc: When a madman begins committing horrific murders inspired by Edgar Allan Poe's works, a young Baltimore detective joins forces with Poe to stop him from making his stories a reality.

name: Dark Shadows
desc: An imprisoned vampire, Barnabas Collins, is set free and returns to his ancestral home, where his dysfunctional descendants are in need of his protection.

name: To Rome with Love
desc: The lives of some visitors and residents of Rome and the romances, adventures and predicaments they get into.

name: The Awakening
desc: In 1921, England is overwhelmed by the loss and grief of World War I. Hoax exposer Florence Cathcart visits a boarding school to explain sightings of a child ghost. Everything she believes unravels as the 'missing' begin to show themselves.

name: Here Comes the Boom
desc: A high school biology teacher looks to become a successful mixed-martial arts fighter in an effort to raise money to prevent extra-curricular activities from being axed at his cash-strapped school.

name: Cirque du Soleil: Worlds Away
desc: A young woman is entranced by an Aerialist. When they fall into the dreamlike world of Cirque du Soleil and are separated, they travel through the different tent worlds trying to find each other.

name: Killing Them Softly
desc: Jackie Cogan is an enforcer hired to restore order after three dumb guys rob a Mob protected card game, causing the local criminal economy to collapse.

name: Promised Land
desc: A salesman for a natural gas company experiences life-changing events after arriving in a small town, where his corporation wants to tap into the available resources.

name: Mama
desc: Annabel and Lucas are faced with the challenge of raising his young nieces that were left alone in the forest for 5 years.... but how alone were they?

name: Jack the Giant Slayer
desc: The ancient war between humans and a race of giants is reignited when Jack, a young farmhand fighting for a kingdom and the love of a princess, opens a gateway between the two worlds.

name: Love Is All You Need
desc: A hairdresser who has lost her hair to cancer finds out her husband is having an affair, travels to Italy for her daughter's wedding and meets a widower who still blames the world for the loss of his wife.

name: Turbo
desc: A freak accident might just help an everyday garden snail achieve his biggest dream: winning the Indy 500.

name: Prince Avalanche
desc: Two highway road workers spend the summer of 1988 away from their city lives. The isolated landscape becomes a place of misadventure as the men find themselves at odds with each other and the women they left behind.

name: Snow White and the Huntsman
desc: In a twist to the fairy tale, the Huntsman ordered to take Snow White into the woods to be killed winds up becoming her protector and mentor in a quest to vanquish the Evil Queen.

name: Total Recall
desc: A factory worker, Douglas Quaid, begins to suspect that he is a spy after visiting Rekall - a company that provides its clients with implanted fake memories of a life they would like to have led - goes wrong and he finds himself on the run.

name: Taken 2
desc: In Istanbul, retired CIA operative Bryan Mills and his wife are taken hostage by the father of a kidnapper Mills killed while rescuing his daughter.

name: Farewell, My Queen
desc: A look at the relationship between Marie Antoinette and one of her readers during the first days of the French Revolution.

name: This Is 40
desc: A look at the lives of Pete and Debbie a few years after the events of "Knocked Up".

name: Safe Haven
desc: A young woman with a mysterious past lands in Southport, North Carolina where her bond with a widower forces her to confront the dark secret that haunts her.

name: Starlet
desc: An unlikely friendship forms between 21 year-old Jane and the elderly Sadie after Jane discovers a hidden stash of money inside an object at Sadie's yard sale.

name: It's a Disaster
desc: Four couples meet for Sunday brunch only to discover they are stuck in a house together as the world may be about to end.

name: Upside Down
desc: Adam and Eden fell in love as teens despite the fact that they live on twinned worlds with gravities that pull in opposite directions. Ten years after a forced separation, Adam sets out on a dangerous quest to reconnect with his love.

name: A Place at the Table
desc: A documentary that investigates incidents of hunger experienced by millions of Americans, and proposed solutions to the problem.

name: To the Wonder
desc: After visiting Mont Saint-Michel, Marina and Neil come to Oklahoma, where problems arise. Marina meets a priest and fellow exile, who is struggling with his vocation, while Neil renews his ties with a childhood friend, Jane.

name: The Company You Keep
desc: A former Weather Underground activist goes on the run from a journalist who has discovered his identity.

name: We Steal Secrets: The Story of WikiLeaks
desc: A documentary that details the creation of Julian Assange's controversial website, which facilitated the largest security breach in U.S. history.

name: The Internship
desc: Two salesmen whose careers have been torpedoed by the digital age find their way into a coveted internship at Google, where they must compete with a group of young, tech-savvy geniuses for a shot at employment.

name: The Family
desc: The Manzoni family, a notorious mafia clan, is relocated to Normandy, France under the witness protection program, where fitting in soon becomes challenging as their old habits die hard.

name: White House Down
desc: While on a tour of the White House with his young daughter, a Capitol policeman springs into action to save his child and protect the president from a heavily armed group of paramilitary invaders.

name: The Campaign
desc: In order to gain influence over their North Carolina district, two CEOs seize an opportunity to oust long-term congressman Cam Brady by putting up a rival candidate. Their man: naive Marty Huggins, director of the local Tourism Center.

name: Magic Mike
desc: A male stripper teaches a younger performer how to party, pick up women, and make easy money.

name: Red Lights
desc: Psychologist Margaret Matheson and her assistant study paranormal activity, which leads them to investigate a world-renowned psychic who has resurfaced years after his toughest critic mysteriously passed away.

name: Step Up Revolution
desc: Emily arrives in Miami with aspirations to become a professional dancer. She sparks with Sean, the leader of a dance crew whose neighborhood is threatened by Emily's father's development plans.

name: The Comedy
desc: Indifferent to the notion of inheriting his father's estate, a Williamsburg guy passes the time with his friends, playing games of mock sincerity and irreverence.

name: Wuthering Heights
desc: A poor boy of unknown origins is rescued from poverty and taken in by the Earnshaw family where he develops an intense relationship with his young foster sister, Cathy. Based on the classic novel by Emily Bronte.

name: Struck by Lightning
desc: A young man recounts the way he blackmailed his fellow classmates into contributing to his literary magazine.

name: Shadow Dancer
desc: Set in 1990s Belfast, an active member of the IRA becomes an informant for MI5 in order to protect her son's welfare.

name: Emperor
desc: As the Japanese surrender at the end of WWII, Gen. Fellers is tasked with deciding if Emperor Hirohito will be hanged as a war criminal. Influencing his ruling is his quest to find Aya, an exchange student he met years earlier in the U.S.

name: V/H/S/2
desc: Searching for a missing student, two private investigators break into his house and find collection of VHS tapes. Viewing the horrific contents of each cassette, they realize there may be dark motives behind the student's disappearance.

name: The Frozen Ground
desc: An Alaska State Trooper partners with a young woman who escaped the clutches of serial killer Robert Hansen to bring the murderer to justice. Based on actual events.

name: Maniac
desc: As he helps a young artist with her upcoming exhibition, the owner of a mannequin shop's deadly, suppressed desires come to the surface.

name: Drinking Buddies
desc: Luke and Kate are co-workers at a Chicago brewery, where they spend their days drinking and flirting...

name: Iron Sky
desc: The Nazis set up a secret base on the moon in 1945 where they hide out and plan to return to power in 2018.

name: The Collection
desc: A man who escapes from the vicious grips of the serial killer known as "The Collector" is blackmailed to rescue an innocent girl from the killer's booby-trapped warehouse.

name: The Sweeney
desc: A hardened detective in the Flying Squad of London's Metropolitan police. Based on the '70s UK TV show.

name: The Baytown Outlaws
desc: When three redneck brothers agree to help a woman save her son from an abusive father, they become targets on the run from an odd cast of characters.

name: Beautiful Creatures
desc: Ethan longs to escape his small Southern town. He meets a mysterious new girl, Lena. Together, they uncover dark secrets about their respective families, their history and their town.

name: Parker
desc: A thief with a unique code of professional ethics is double-crossed by his crew and left for dead. Assuming a new disguise and forming an unlikely alliance with a woman on the inside, he looks to hijack the score of the crew's latest heist.

name: Dark Skies
desc: As the Barret family's peaceful suburban life is rocked by an escalating series of disturbing events, they come to learn that a terrifying and deadly force is after them.

name: Hansel & Gretel: Witch Hunters
desc: Hansel & Gretel are bounty hunters who track and kill witches all over the world. As the fabled Blood Moon approaches, the siblings encounter a new form of evil that might hold a secret to their past.

name: American Mary
desc: The story follows medical student, Mary Mason, as she becomes increasingly broke and disenchanted with the surgical world she once admired...

name: On the Road
desc: Young writer Sal Paradise has his life shaken by the arrival of free-spirited Dean Moriarty and his girl, Marylou. As they travel across the country, they encounter a mix of people who each impact their journey indelibly.

name: Kevin Hart: Let Me Explain
desc: Filmed at a sold-out performance at Madison Square Garden, comedian Kevin Hart delivers material from his 2012 "Let Me Explain" concert tour.

name: Lovelace
desc: The story of Linda Lovelace, who is used and abused by the porn industry at the behest of her coercive husband, before taking control of her life.

name: Abraham Lincoln: Vampire Hunter
desc: Abraham Lincoln, the 16th President of the United States, discovers vampires are planning to take over the United States. He makes it his mission to eliminate them.

name: Rock of Ages
desc: A small town girl and a city boy meet on the Sunset Strip, while pursuing their Hollywood dreams.

name: Damsels in Distress
desc: A trio of girls set out to change the male-dominated environment of the Seven Oaks college campus, and to rescue their fellow students from depression, grunge and low standards of every kind.

name: Nitro Circus: The Movie
desc: Travis Pastrana and his tight-knit, highly-skilled, adrenaline-addicted friends bring their impossible, ridiculous, insane and hysterical adventures to the big screen for the first time.

name: 2 Days in New York
desc: Manhattan couple Marion and Mingus, who each have children from prior relationships, find their comfortable family dynamic jostled by a visit from Marion's relatives.

name: Butter
desc: In small-town Iowa, an adopted girl discovers her talent for butter carving and finds herself pitted against an ambitious local woman in their town's annual contest.

name: Diary of a Wimpy Kid: Dog Days
desc: School is out and Greg is ready for the days of summer, when all his plans go wrong. What on earth is he going to do all summer?

name: 10 Years
desc: The night before their high school reunion, a group of friends realize they still haven't quite grown up in some ways.

name: 6 Souls
desc: A female forensic psychiatrist discovers that all of one of her patient's multiple personalities are murder victims. She will have to find out what's happening before her time is finished.

name: Solomon Kane
desc: A ruthless mercenary renounces violence after learning his soul is bound for hell. When a young girl is kidnapped and her family slain by a sorcerer's murderous cult, he is forced to fight and seek his redemption slaying evil.

name: Erased
desc: An ex-CIA agent and his estranged daughter are forced on the run when his employers erase all records of his existence, and mark them both for termination as part of a wide-reaching international conspiracy.

name: Wrong
desc: Dolph Springer wakes up one morning to realize he has lost the love of his life, his dog, Paul. During his quest to get Paul (and his life) back, Dolph radically changes the lives of others -- risking his sanity all the while.

name: Only God Forgives
desc: Julian, a drug-smuggler thriving in Bangkok's criminal underworld, sees his life get even more complicated when his mother compels him to find and kill whoever is responsible for his brother's recent death.

name: Man of Tai Chi
desc: A young martial artist's unparalleled Tai Chi skills land him in a highly lucrative underworld fight club.

name: The Mortal Instruments: City of Bones
desc: When her mother disappears, Clary Fray learns that she descends from a line of warriors who protect our world from demons. She joins forces with others like her and heads into a dangerous alternate New York called Downworld.

name: Hit and Run
desc: Former getaway driver Charlie Bronson jeopardizes his Witness Protection Plan identity in order to help his girlfriend get to Los Angeles. The feds and Charlie's former gang chase them on the road.

name: The Incredible Burt Wonderstone
desc: When a street magician's stunts begins to make their show look stale, superstar magicians Burt Wonderstone and Anton Marvelton look to salvage on their act - and their friendship - by staging their own daring stunt.

name: G.I. Joe: Retaliation
desc: The G.I. Joes are not only fighting their mortal enemy Cobra; they are forced to contend with threats from within the government that jeopardize their very existence.

name: Cockneys vs Zombies
desc: A gang of bank robbers fight their way out of a zombie-infested London.

name: Percy Jackson: Sea of Monsters
desc: In order to restore their dying safe haven, the son of Poseidon and his friends embark on a quest to the Sea of Monsters to find the mythical Golden Fleece while trying to stop an ancient evil from rising.

name: The Hole
desc: A pair of brothers stumble upon a mysterious hole in their basement that leads to the darkest corridors of their fears and nightmares.

name: V/H/S
desc: When a group of misfits is hired by an unknown third party to burglarize a desolate house and acquire a rare VHS tape, they discover more found footage than they bargained for.

name: The Possession
desc: A young girl buys an antique box at a yard sale, unaware that inside the collectible lives a malicious ancient spirit. The girl's father teams with his ex-wife to find a way to end the curse upon their child.

name: The Paperboy
desc: A reporter returns to his Florida hometown to investigate a case involving a death row inmate.

name: For a Good Time, Call...
desc: Former college frenemies Lauren and Katie move into a fabulous Gramercy Park apartment, and in order to make ends meet, the unlikely pair start a phone sex line together.

name: Parental Guidance
desc: Artie and Diane agree to look after their three grandkids when their type-A helicopter parents need to leave town for work. Problems arise when the kids' 21st-century behavior collides with Artie and Diane's old-school methods.

name: Bullet to the Head
desc: After watching their respective partners die, a New Orleans hitman and a Washington D.C. detective form an alliance in order to bring down their common enemy.

name: Phantom
desc: The haunted Captain of a Soviet submarine holds the fate of the world in his hands. Forced to leave his family behind, he is charged with leading a covert mission cloaked in mystery.

name: Spring Breakers
desc: Four college girls who land in jail after robbing a restaurant in order to fund their spring break vacation find themselves bailed out by a drug and arms dealer who wants them to do some dirty work.

name: Jobs
desc: The story of Steve Jobs' ascension from college dropout into one of the most revered creative entrepreneurs of the 20th century.

name: The To Do List
desc: Feeling pressured to become more sexually experienced before she goes to college, Brandy Klark makes a list of things to accomplish before hitting campus in the fall.

name: The Watch
desc: Four men who form a neighborhood watch group as a way to get out of their day-to-day family routines find themselves defending the Earth from an alien invasion.

name: Touchback
desc: A man looks back 15 years to the injury that ended his career as a promising high-school football player.

name: The Twilight Saga: Breaking Dawn - Part 2
desc: After the birth of Renesmee, the Cullens gather other vampire clans in order to protect the child from a false allegation that puts the family in front of the Volturi.

name: Hyde Park on Hudson
desc: The story of the love affair between FDR and his distant cousin Margaret "Daisy" Suckley, centered around the weekend in 1939 when the King and Queen of the United Kingdom visited upstate New York.

name: The Sorcerer and the White Snake
desc: A master monk tries to protect a naive young physician from a thousand-year-old snake demon. A contest of psychic powers results in mayhem.

name: The Oranges
desc: The enduring friendship between the Walling and Ostroff families is tested when Nina, the prodigal Ostroff daughter, returns home for the holidays after a five-year absence and enters into an affair with David, head of the Walling family.

name: 21 & Over
desc: The night before his big medical school interview, a promising student celebrates his 21st birthday with his two best friends.

name: The Host
desc: When an unseen enemy threatens mankind by taking over their bodies and erasing their memories, Melanie will risk everything to protect the people she cares most about, proving that love can conquer all in a dangerous new world.

name: The Pact
desc: As a woman struggles to come to grips with her past in the wake of her mother's death, an unsettling presence emerges in her childhood home.

name: The Guilt Trip
desc: As inventor Andy Brewster is about to embark on the road trip of a lifetime, a quick stop at his mom's house turns into an unexpected cross-country voyage with her along for the ride.

name: The Man with the Iron Fists
desc: On the hunt for a fabled treasure of gold, a band of warriors, assassins, and a rogue British soldier descend upon a village in feudal China, where a humble blacksmith looks to defend himself and his fellow villagers.

name: Identity Thief
desc: Mild-mannered businessman Sandy Patterson travels from Denver to Miami to confront the deceptively harmless-looking woman who has been living it up after stealing Sandy's identity.

name: At Any Price
desc: A farming family's business is threatened by an unexpected crisis, further testing the relationship between a father and his rebellious son.

name: The English Teacher
desc: An English teacher's life is disrupted when a former student returns to her small town after failing as a playwright in New York.

name: All the Boys Love Mandy Lane
desc: A group of high-schoolers invite Mandy Lane, a good girl who became quite hot over the summer, to a weekend party on a secluded ranch. While the festivities rage on, the number of revelers begins to drop quite mysteriously.

name: Girl Most Likely
desc: A failed New York playwright awkwardly navigates the transition from Next Big Thing to Last Year's News.

name: That's My Boy
desc: While in his teens, Donny fathered a son, Todd, and raised him as a single parent up until Todd's 18th birthday. Now, after not seeing each other for years, Todd's world comes crashing down when Donny resurfaces just before Todd's wedding.

name: Gayby
desc: Jenn (straight) and Matt (gay) are best friends from college who are now in their thirties. Single by choice, they decide to fulfill a youthful promise to have a child together... the old fashioned way.

name: The Bay
desc: Chaos breaks out in a small Maryland town after an ecological disaster occurs.

name: To the Arctic 3D
desc: A journey into the lives of a mother polar bear and her two seven-month-old cubs as they navigate the changing Arctic wilderness they call home.

name: Escape from Planet Earth
desc: Astronaut Scorch Supernova finds himself caught in a trap when he responds to an SOS from a notoriously dangerous alien planet.

name: Admission
desc: A Princeton admissions officer who is up for a major promotion takes a professional risk after she meets a college-bound alternative school kid who just might be the son she gave up years ago in a secret adoption.

name: Antiviral
desc: After becoming infected with the virus that killed superstar Hannah Geist, Syd March must unravel the mystery surrounding her death to save his own life.

name: The Purge
desc: In the future, a wealthy family is held hostage for harboring the target of a murderous syndicate during the Purge, a 12-hour period in which any and all crime is legalized.

name: The Lifeguard
desc: A former valedictorian quits her reporter job in New York and returns to the place she last felt happy: her childhood home in Connecticut. She gets work as a lifeguard and starts a dangerous relationship with a troubled teenager.

name: Planes
desc: A cropdusting plane with a fear of heights lives his dream of competing in a famous around-the-world aerial race.

name: What to Expect When You're Expecting
desc: A look at love through the eyes of five interconnected couples experiencing the thrills and surprises of having a baby, and ultimately coming to understand the universal truth that no matter what you plan for, life doesn't always deliver what's expected.

name: Resident Evil: Retribution
desc: Alice fights alongside a resistance movement in the continuing battle against the Umbrella Corporation and the undead.

name: The Trouble with Bliss
desc: A guy in his mid-thirties watches as his life comically unravels after he enters into a relationship with the daughter of a former high school classmate.

name: A Good Day to Die Hard
desc: John McClane travels to Russia to help out his seemingly wayward son, Jack, only to discover that Jack is a CIA operative working to prevent a nuclear-weapons heist, causing the father and son to team up against underworld forces.

name: Paranoia
desc: An entry-level employee at a powerful corporation finds himself occupying a corner office, but at a dangerous price: he must spy on his boss's old mentor to secure for him a multi-billion dollar advantage.

name: Crooked Arrows
desc: A story centered on a Native American lacrosse team making its way through a prep school league tournament.

name: The Day
desc: A group of five people working to stay alive in a post-apocalyptic future discover what they think is a safe, abandoned farmhouse, but they soon find themselves fighting to stay alive as a gang of bloodthirsty predators attack.

name: Cosmopolis
desc: Riding across Manhattan in a stretch limo in order to get a haircut, a 28-year-old billionaire asset manager's day devolves into an odyssey with a cast of characters that start to tear his world apart.

name: House at the End of the Street
desc: A mother and daughter move to a new town and find themselves living next door to a house where a young girl murdered her parents. When the daughter befriends the surviving son, she learns the story is far from over.

name: Stolen
desc: A former thief frantically searches for his missing daughter, who has been kidnapped and locked in the trunk of a taxi.

name: Silent Hill: Revelation 3D
desc: When her father disappears, Heather Mason is drawn into a strange and terrifying alternate reality that holds answers to the horrific nightmares that have plagued her since childhood.

name: Playing for Keeps
desc: A former sports star who's fallen on hard times starts coaching his son's soccer team as a way to get his life together. His attempts to become an adult are met with challenges from the attractive soccer moms who pursue him at every turn.

name: Atlas Shrugged II: The Strike
desc: With the global economy on the brink of collapse, Dagny Taggart discovers what might be the answer to a mounting energy crisis and races against the clock to prevent the motor of the World from being stopped for good.

name: The Numbers Station
desc: A former black ops agent and the young woman he's assigned to protect fight for survival after a surprise attack.

name: Pusher
desc: In London, a street dealer's life spins out of control over the course of one week after he borrows money from his supplier on what's supposed to be a sure thing.

name: Killing Season
desc: Two veterans of the Bosnian War -- one American, one Serbian -- find their unlikely friendship turn tense with one of them reveals their true intentions.

name: Grown Ups 2
desc: After moving his family back to his hometown to be with his friends and their kids, Lenny finds out that between old bullies, new bullies, schizo bus drivers, drunk cops on skis, and 400 costumed party crashers sometimes crazy follows you.

name: [REC]³ Génesis
desc: A couple's wedding day turns into a horrific events as some of the guests start showing signs of a strange illness.

name: Universal Soldier: Day of Reckoning
desc: John looks to take down Luc Deveraux after a home invasion claims his wife and daughter. The fight pits John against Andrew Scott and an army of genetically enhanced warriors; meanwhile, he must contend with a UniSol in relentless pursuit.

name: Red Dawn
desc: A group of teenagers look to save their town from an invasion of North Korean soldiers.

name: Bachelorette
desc: Three friends are asked to be bridesmaids at a wedding of a woman they used to ridicule back in high school.

name: The Big Wedding
desc: A long-divorced couple fakes being married as their family unites for a wedding.

name: The Lords of Salem
desc: Heidi, a radio DJ, is sent a box containing a record -- a "gift from the Lords." The sounds within the grooves trigger flashbacks of her town's violent past. Is Heidi going mad, or are the Lords back to take revenge on Salem, Massachusetts?

name: The Smurfs 2
desc: The Smurfs team up with their human friends to rescue Smurfette, who has been kidnapped by Gargamel since she knows a secret spell that can turn the evil sorcerer's newest creation - creatures called the Naughties - into real Smurfs.

name: Chernobyl Diaries
desc: Six tourists hire an extreme tour guide who takes them to the abandoned city Pripyat, the former home to the workers of the Chernobyl nuclear reactor. During their exploration, they soon discover they are not alone.

name: Won't Back Down
desc: Two determined mothers足, one a teacher, look to transform their children's failing inner city school. Facing a powerful and entrenched bureaucracy, they risk everything to make a difference in the education and future of their children.

name: 2016: Obama's America
desc: A documentary that examines the question, "If Barack Obama wins a second term, where will we be in 2016?"

name: Katy Perry: Part of Me
desc: A documentary that chronicles Katy Perry's life on and off-stage.

name: The ABCs of Death
desc: A 26-chapter anthology that showcases death in all its vicious wonder and brutal beauty.

name: Fun Size
desc: Wren's Halloween plans go awry when she's made to babysit her brother, who disappears into a sea of trick-or-treaters. With her best friend and two nerds at her side, she needs to find her brother before her mom finds out he's missing.

name: The Haunting in Connecticut 2: Ghosts of Georgia
desc: A young family moves into an historic home in Georgia, only to learn they are not the house's only inhabitants. Soon they find themselves in the presence of a secret rising from underground and threatening to bring down anyone in its path.

name: A Haunted House
desc: Malcolm and Kisha move into their dream home, but soon learn a demon also resides there. When Kisha becomes possessed, Malcolm - determined to keep his sex life on track - turns to a priest, a psychic, and a team of ghost-busters for help.

name: A Glimpse Inside the Mind of Charles Swan III
desc: A graphic designer's enviable life slides into despair when his girlfriend breaks up with him.

name: After Earth
desc: A crash landing leaves Kitai Raige and his father Cypher stranded on Earth, a millennium after events forced humanity's escape. With Cypher injured, Kitai must embark on a perilous journey to signal for help.

name: The Cold Light of Day
desc: After his family is kidnapped during their sailing trip in Spain, a young Wall Street trader is confronted by the people responsible: intelligence agents looking to recover a mysterious briefcase.

name: Texas Chainsaw 3D
desc: A young woman travels to Texas to collect an inheritance; little does she know that an encounter with a chainsaw-wielding killer is part of the reward.

name: Sparkle
desc: Set in the 1960s, three sisters form girl group and soon become local sensations with major label interest, but fame becomes a challenge as the close-knit family begins to fall apart.

name: Vamps
desc: Two female vampires in modern-day New York City are faced with daunting romantic possibilities.

name: Aftershock
desc: In Chile, a group of travelers who are in an underground nightclub when a massive earthquake hits quickly learn that reaching the surface is just the beginning of their nightmare.

name: Branded
desc: Set in a dystopian future where corporate brands have created a disillusioned population, one man's effort to unlock the truth behind the conspiracy will lead to an epic battle with hidden forces that control the world.

name: Vehicle 19
desc: A foreign traveler (Walker) unknowingly picks up a rental car that will tie him to a web of corrupt local police.

name: LUV
desc: An 11-year-old boy gets a crash course in what it means to be a man when he spends a day with the ex-convict uncle he idolizes.

name: The Last Ride
desc: At the end of 1952, with the best years of Hank Williams's career behind him, he hires a local kid to drive him through the Appalachian countryside for a pair of New Years shows in West Virginia and Ohio.

name: Filly Brown
desc: A promising hip-hop rhymer from Los Angeles finds herself in a gray area when a record producer offers her a compromising shot at stardom.

name: Hammer of the Gods
desc: A young man transforms into a brutal warrior as he travels the unforgiving landscape in search of his long lost brother, Hakan the Ferrocious, whose people are relying on him to restore order to their kingdom.

name: Paranormal Activity 4
desc: It has been five years since the disappearance of Katie and Hunter, and a suburban family witness strange events in their neighborhood when a woman and a mysterious child move in.

name: Movie 43
desc: A series of interconnected short films follows a washed-up producer as he pitches insane story lines featuring some of the biggest stars in Hollywood.

name: Battle of the Year
desc: Battle of the Year attracts all the best teams from around the world, but the Americans haven't won in fifteen years. Dante enlists Blake to assemble a team of the best dancers and bring the Trophy back to America where it started.

name: Getaway
desc: Former race-car driver Brent Magna is pitted against the clock when his wife is kidnapped by a mysterious villain. He commandeers a young woman's car and takes her on on a high-speed race against time.

name: The Apparition
desc: A couple is haunted by a supernatural presence that is unleashed during a college experiment.

name: Bad Kids Go to Hell
desc: On a stormy Saturday afternoon, six students from Crestview Academy begin to meet horrible fates as they serve out their detentions. Is a fellow student to blame, or perhaps Crestview's alleged ghosts are behind the terrible acts?

name: Peeples
desc: Sparks fly when Wade Walker crashes the Peeples annual reunion in the Hamptons to ask for their precious daughter Grace's hand in marriage.

name: Last Ounce of Courage
desc: The son of a fallen soldier, years after his father's death, tries to reconnect with his grandfather, who is still grieving the loss of his child.

name: The Last Exorcism Part II
desc: As Nell Sweetzer tries to build a new life after the events of the first movie, the evil force that once possessed her returns with an even more horrific plan.

name: Temptation: Confessions of a Marriage Counselor
desc: An ambitious married woman's temptation by a handsome billionaire leads to betrayal, recklessness, and forever alters the course of her life.

name: One Direction: This Is Us
desc: A look at Niall, Zayn, Liam, Louis, and Harry's meteoric rise to fame, from their humble hometown beginnings and competing on the X-Factor, to conquering the world and performing at London's famed O2 Arena.

name: Scary MoVie
desc: A couple begin to experience some unusual activity after bringing their lost nieces and nephew home. With the help of home-surveillance cameras, they learn they're being stalked by a nefarious demon.
